title: Learning Design Practice Enhancement: Intensive Spanish Vocabulary Learning Course with Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify 50 classroom-, café-, and home-related vocabulary items presented in an AR environment with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can apply 10 situational Spanish conversational expressions practiced via AR simulations to real-life dialogues.
Learners can perform role allocation with team members in an AR learning content development project using collaboration tools and submit final outputs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
